alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 4:09AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect northwestern Trumbull...Geauga...northeastern Cuyahoga...southern Lake... Ashtabula...Erie and northwestern Crawford Counties Until 545 AM EST.... At 408 AM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from near Cleveland to near Chesterland to 6 miles northwest of Orwell to near Findley Lake. The band is expected to wobble with little overall movement. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Winds to 30 mph... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Up to 2 inches of quick snow accumulation... Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Erie, Ashtabula, Conneaut, Chardon, Euclid, Mentor, Cleveland Heights, Solon, Willoughby, Warrensville Heights, Edinboro, Geneva, North East, South Russell, Union City, Girard, Middlefield, Cambridge Springs and Orwell. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 311, 312, 313, 314, 315, 319, 320, 329, 330, 331, and 332.
